content.text: ) needs to be completed before this ticket
Applicant contact entity to be used
Where Owner Type “Self” is selected, auto populate the pet owner details from applicant contact details. (JS for logic)
Where Owner Type “Third Party” is selected, caseworker will search for existing contact. Where one does not exist, a new contact record is created.
Quick Create Form to be used to capture the new pet owner contact details.
Lock pet owner fields in the form from editing. If the caseworker wants to change these details, the contact record will need to be changed directly.
add pet owner contact details to offline applications
pet owner contact details against the record are recorded
AC1: Auto populate pet owner details where Self is selected
I have created a new offline application
I add a pet owner contact details
the pet owner contact details are auto populated from the contact record
the Pet owner look up is also auto populated
AC2: Add new pet owner contact record to offline application record
I have created a new offline application
I select Third Party as the owner type
I click on the look up
I cannot find an existing contact
I click on the + New button (via the look up)
I can add the new contact details
AC3: Lock pet owner details on form
I have created a new offline application
look in the pet owner detail section
the pet owner details on the application will be made read only as per the below:
I have created a new offline application
the pet owner field is populated
the pet owner details are updated on the form from the owner Contact record
AC5: Hide Country field in contact entity from offline application form
I have created a new offline application
contact details are added to the form via the quick create form
the field Country is hidden* from the quick create
AC6: Hide Country field in PTD application form
I have opened a new PTD application
I view the pet owner details
*Country is not captured in Portal as this does not conform to
address capture standards. Country is in place only for IDM purposes.
Create the Pet Owner look up
auto populate pet owner look up where Owner Type = Self
auto populate pet owner fields based on change to pet owner lookup
use the same logic to create a new contact where a pet owner does not exist in contact details entity
Re-use quick create form capability to create new pet owner record as per new applicant record
Lock pet owner fields on the form. (Changes to be made directly on the record which will then be reflected on the form)

fields.summary: NIPTS - Enter Pet Owner contact details

content.text: Reviewed and moved ready for dev 19/7/24
AC4 to be discussed as a separate ticket with discussions around processes.
AC5 and AC6 added to reflect the removal of country as per clarification from portal:

Country field is only in IDCOMS because of IDM and not because this is captured as part of pet application. These will there be hidden from the front end. This will be for both online and offline application

content.text: a slightly technical ticket but does impact the users in terms of how they interact with the form and the error messages they will see. Would be grateful for your thoughts on the error messages (last two columns).
Other Colour error message - can we move the ‘the’ so it is just “please complete Other Colour”
Email - if the box is left empty, will the error message not show and only kick in if there is data typed in that is not the correct format?
Other error messages seem fine, presumably only the mandatory boxes will be highlighted in red?
Error message updated. Note added to email address and to highlight mandatory fields as red when not filled in.
